summary: Bug fix verification for 4 reported issues - All 4 bugs FIXED and verified working. Backend: Claims filter_status API working correctly. Frontend: Claims filter buttons, Claims sort dropdown, Harvest filter panel, and Harvest All/None toggles all functioning as expected.
critical_code_review_comments: ApiService.getClaims correctly uses filter_status query param (line 46)
ClaimsList sort dropdown shows 8 options with proper data-testid attributes
HarvestPage filter panel shows when toggle-filters button is clicked
HarvestPage All/None buttons correctly toggle all filter states
HarvestMap receives activeFilters prop and filters pins accordingly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 bug fixes verified: 1) Claims filter buttons work (229 total -> 178 New -> 1 In Progress), 2) Claims sort dropdown shows 8 options, 3) Harvest filter panel opens with 6 status filters, 4) Harvest All/None toggles work correctly

Bug 1 - Claims filter buttons.details: Filter buttons (All/New/In Progress/Under Review/Completed) correctly filter claims. Verified: All=229, New=178, In Progress=1. Backend uses filter_status param correctly.

Bug 2 - Claims sort dropdown.details: Sort button now shows dropdown with 8 options instead of cycling: Date Updated (Newest/Oldest), Client Name (A-Z/Z-A), Value (Highest/Lowest), Date of Loss (Newest/Oldest)

Bug 3 - Harvest filter button.details: Filter icon click opens filter panel with 'Filter by Status' header and 6 color-coded status buttons (Not Home, Not Interested, Callback, Appointment, Signed, Do Not Knock)

Bug 4 - Harvest filter toggles.details: All/None buttons work correctly. 'None' clears all filters (buttons become gray), 'All' selects all filters (buttons become colored)
